Description.Title: SnowDepth (STICS snow cover depth submodel)
Description.ExtendedDescription: Computes daily snow cover depth from snowfall accumulation, melt, and compaction. The model updates depth by adding the contribution of new snow (scaled by specified new-snow density), subtracting melt, and applying a linear compaction term proportional to previous-day snow depth. If melt exceeds available snow, depth is set to zero. Time step: daily.
Description.ShortDescription: Daily snow depth from accumulation, melt, and compaction using a user-defined new-snow density.

Input.name: Sdepth_t1
Input.description: snow cover depth from previous day
